name: CoreBreach
description:
CoreBreach is THE brand-new futuristic "anti-gravity" racing game for Mac OS X.

** PLEASE CHECK THE SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS PRIOR TO PURCHASE **

6 EXCITING ANTI-GRAVITY SHIPS
CoreBreach offers 6 great ships from easy maneuverable to rigid but ultra fast - and an unbelievable bonus ship.

6 RACE TRACKS & REVERSE MODE
You can choose from 6 beautiful, detailed and futuristic tracks of varying difficulty in both directions to prove your skills.

6 POWERFUL COMBAT WEAPONS
Combat your enemies using 6 powerful weapons including the deadly "Zeus Plasma Cannon" or choose "Space Nitro".

UNIQUE GAMEPLAY & GRAPHICS
CoreBreach features a good looking high contrast graphics style and offers exclusive gameplay ideas like the "CoreMode".
Advanced users can choose the in-ship camera mode for mind bending speed sensation (Warning: can cause dizziness).

CAREER-MODE & STORY-LINE
Fight your evil opponents while racing towards world domination in the thrilling story-mode.
Win trophy money to upgrade your weapons and tune your ships to be even better.

THE SOUNDTRACK OF 1000-MPH RACING
CoreBreach offers a powerful and varied 50-minute soundtrack to support the immersive gameplay.

SPLIT-SCREEN MULTIPLAYER AND ONLINE TIME-ATTACK
Battle it out with your friends using the split-screen multiplayer mode or compete globally with the internet high-scores.
Your lap times are automatically posted in the high-scores after each game - no account creation needed.

GAME CONTROLLER SUPPORT
CoreBreach supports common steering wheels and game pads - you can even play with two controllers (split-screen).

USER-MADE RACE TRACK SUPPORT
CoreBreach supports the creation of user-made race tracks (3D modeling skills required) and easy sharing and playing of these tracks.

TRUE MAC NATIVE GAMING
CoreBreach is developed from the ground up for Mac OS X and provides these unique benefits:
• effortlessly switch to other applications while playing - your race is automatically paused
• seamlessly change from fullscreen- to windowed-mode and back even during the race
• you can still see the on-screen notifications from other apps while playing (mails, music, instant-messages, etc)
• the user interface for the game menu uses the familiar and well designed Mac-native controls for ease-of-use
• CoreBreach is not a cheap port of a iPad game, meaning you can choose resolution and graphics settings to your liking

*** SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS ***
* 64-bit Intel processor
* 1GB free disk space
* Compatible video card, one of:
- ATI Radeon HD 2400 or higher
- NVIDIA GeForce 7300 or higher
- INTEL HD Graphics 3000 or higher
